page.title: 13JUNIOR EDUCATION THORNBURY
page.content: By law a child must attend school at the beginning of the term after he is five, and continue until after his 16th birthday. Thornbury has no nursery school provision for children younger than five but many parents elect to send their children to a playgroup. { {THORNBURY PLAYGROUPS} Jack and Jill; Gillingstool; The Methodists; The Chantry; Mundy; Christ the King; { {THORNBURY INFANT AND JUNIOR SCHOOLS (for children aged 5 to 11 years) NAME NUMBER ON ROLL Manorbrook 286 St Mary's Church of England 222 Christ the King 128 Crossways 418 Gillingstool 226
